name: SpaceSamurai
description:
My Jam submission for the Epic Mega Jam 2019.

The earth cult is spreading across the galaxy, is time for payback  and get this cult down to earth where it belongs.  How? Well, maybe the Old School RoboSamurai Clan knows the answer.

Credits (Game):
Efren Fregoso Jimenez

Pre-Made Assets used:
Anna - Innu Games - MJH Modular Japanese Town House
Samurai Helmet - ARIA - Sketchfab
Astronaut 3d model Javi_DaviYT - Sketchfab
Drawing Astronaut Illustration PNG - ahmad786 
Astronaut Cartoon - kissclipart
www.cct-seecity.com - How-small-are-we-in-the-scale-of-the-universe-6
astronaut, Cat Wallpaper HD - https://wallup.net/astronaut-cat/
Satellite - Euan Mitchell
